title.content: How much will it cost the Waltzer owner for enough cuddly monkeys for a day?

clue2.content: The owner decides that every 10th person will be given a cuddly toy monkey.

clue3.content: To get people to go on the Waltzer the owner offers a free prize.

clue4.content: The fair is open for 6 hours a day.

clue5.content: The music on the Waltzer is played very loud all day.

clue6.content: At the fair there is a Waltzer.

clue8.content: Two people can sit together in a car on the Waltzer.

clue9.content: There are 5 cars altogether on the Waltzer.

clue10.content: It costs the owner Â£3 for one monkey.

clue11.content: You must be at least 9 years old to ride the Waltzer.
